tags: we'll see but that's really the only storyline that makes much sense to me
summary: So, I have been thinking (rather hard, up to the point where it would keep me awake instead of youtube) recently about one of...
body:
So, I have been thinking (rather hard, up to the point where it would keep me awake instead of youtube) recently about one of the phenomena in the bendemption discourse, namely the question of whether Ben’s redemption should - or, indeed, can - rely on simply leaving fo and joining resistance. Now, for my own part, I’m not really a fan of this scenario but only lately I realised why it really rubs me the wrong way as far as storytelling is concerned. I think there’s a belief that rejection of Ben joining the resistance ties to not really caring for them - but that’s not true, at least not neccessarily.

The truth is, the story in which Ben does something for the resistance that really, believably buys him audience forgiveness and is really cathartic (for example, all scenarios in which he commits some selfless sacrifice which turns the tides of war) undermines one of the major points of TLJ, namely how much they in fact don’t need him because teamwork and God are on their side. I’ll say more - literally no redemption theory really puts the stakes with the resistance. The only story in which Ben simply leaving fo for resistance works is the reading in which his maximum 1 hour story is all that matters with all the remaining 5 hours - including Rey’s journey - serving as a background. And, sorry, but this just doesn’t work. I can agree that this would make for a more poignant prodigal son imagery but prodigal son imagery won’t make up for 5 hours of pretty pointless action.

I also don’t want to make it sound like I’m banking on the storyline in which all of the war storyline gets backsided in favour of force esotericism, Ben actually has nothing to atone for and his mystical marriage with Rey somehow solves all of galaxy problems. Nah, not after all the soviet propaganda imagery in tlj.

So while I understand why the notion of renperor not being so evil or completely passive - and the stakes of the sequels lying not in vanquishing only reintegrating as many fo members as possible - may sound like blind worship and making all the story about Ben, it is in fact the only major redemption route that doesn’t depend on making all of the story about him.

I’m not saying this is what neccessarily has to happen. TBH, my main point is really that thinking Ben joining the resistance isn’t a very good plot option doesn’t mean hating or not caring about the res (like yeah, I sometimes roll my eyes at them, but I’m far from saying they’re even comparably evil to fo). But really, after four years I want a proper, cathartic story this december rather than whoo-hoo, Ben lived to see the end credits which was kinda obvious since the reylo kiss an hour ago.

summary: My wonderful and awesome friend @chocolatechipbanana sent me a present via mail today... and it is the most beautiful thing I’ve...
body: My wonderful and awesome friend @chocolatechipbanana sent me a present via mail today… and it is the most beautiful thing I’ve ever received! Also, she embroided it herself, and this blows my mind, I could never do anything like it. Thank you my kindred spirit, I shall cherish this forever ❤️

tags: from far away it looks like a cover of a VHS tape
summary: 🔥⚔ ~ The Edge of Light and Dark ~ ⚔🔥 What started out as practicing action poses turned into what would happen if a Jedi wanted...
caption:
🔥⚔ ~ The Edge of Light and Dark ~ ⚔🔥

What started out as practicing action poses turned into what would happen if a Jedi wanted to do the right thing, but anger and fear gets the best of them. We see that a lot with Anakin Skywalker, now I wanted to depict that with my own character, Talia. War quickly followed her and she fights to the bitter end to protect the family that took her in after she lost her master and crash landed on their planet, and she looks scary while doing it. As if the dark side is slowly creeping in…

summary:
Lars Mikkelsen medvirker i ny dansk Star Wars-film 
Brormand Mads medvirkede i Rogue One: A Star Wars Story og nu kan storebror...
caption:
Lars Mikkelsen medvirker i ny dansk Star Wars-film
Brormand Mads medvirkede i Rogue One: A Star Wars Story og nu kan storebror Lars Mikkelsen også skrive Star Wars på visitkortet. Endda i en dansk produceret fanfilm, der har fået titlen Star Wars: Shrouded Destiny. Den første teater er blevet lanceret og den kan, naturligvis, ses ovenfor.

summary: Reylo Fic Recs Live Fic - 01.19.19
title: Reylo Fic Recs Live Fic - 01.19.19
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2FOrrJI

by Crysania, madie080802, Noppoh, ReyloFicRecs, safewordisdevilsnare, SirenBanshee, tmwillson3

Prompt: During a bank robbery, you’re surprised when the criminals seem to recognize you and retreat in fear. Only later do you learn that your high school sweetheart now runs a global crime syndicate and has placed you on a ‘no harm’ list. You decide to pay them a visit after all these years.

title: Reylo Fic Recs Live Fic - 01.19.19
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2FOrrJI

by Crysania, madie080802, Noppoh, ReyloFicRecs, safewordisdevilsnare, SirenBanshee, tmwillson3

Prompt: During a bank robbery, you’re surprised when the criminals seem to recognize you and retreat in fear. Only later do you learn that your high school sweetheart now runs a global crime syndicate and has placed you on a ‘no harm’ list. You decide to pay them a visit after all these years.

  • Fandoms: Star Wars - All Media Types, Star Wars Sequel Trilogy
  • Rating: Mature

  • Categories: F/M

  • Relationships: Kylo Ren/Rey, Rey/Ben Solo | Kylo Ren, Rey/Ben Solo
  • Additional Tags: Impromptu Writing, Live Fic Writing, Reylo Fic Recs

blog.name: mandowords
blog.title: Miit'alor
blog.description: I am a descriptivist linguist for the Mando'a language. I show what it can do, not what it MUST do. This is a place for discussion about Mando'a, and Mandalorian society and culture. Feel free to use the head cannons from this blog (or reblogged from others) in your RP or writing. All words and descriptions are taken from the mandoa.org Mandalorian Dictionary. Want to support this blog? Buy me a Kofi? OR buy some Mando'a themed items? Visit our Discord? Blog icon by Rina

tags: im just so tired at this point
please leave me alone if you want to yell at me
summary: My resignation letter to the SW fandom
body:
My resignation letter to the SW fandom

Hey.

I‘ve thought long and hard if I should do this and what I would write. Here is the result:

Fandom was always a safe space for me. Somewhere I was able to write what I wanted and geek out over the characters I loved. I was used to the old ‘Dont Like Dont Read’ spiel and I respected people in fandom. To each their own.

Trust me when I say that I’ve seen shit, weird ships like ThorinxAzog or even BilboxThorinxAzog. But guess what? I kept my mouth shut and moved on. Because it’s a) none of my business what you ship and b) super rude to shit on people. You just didn’t do that. It was almost an unwritten law that we all respected, at least to a certain extent.

And then I got into SW and it was amazing in the beginning. I immediately fell into writing again, even though I never reached the level of fic production I had for Bagginshield back between DoS and BotFA.

I was never in the thick of any fandom mess like the famed Sherlock-Hiatus-Bashing after S3 and S4. I was just not interessted in it and fandom has never ever controlled my life. I never defined myself over my ship and fandoms to such an extent that it seeped into my every day life.

I went through the long stretches of hiatus of shows and movie series and I met a lot of really awesome people. Even though I am not longer in contact with them as I used to be, they are still in the back of my mind when I think of ‘X’ ship.

I love SW do not get me wrong. Like so many others I grew up on it, I adore CW for all it’s geekiness and my heart belongs to General Hux in this life and the next.

Just the way the fandom treats certain ships like Reylo makes me sick. The bashing of artists for reasons like alledged ‘child pornograpyh’ (I think we all know who I mean) or including Rey in fanwork about Kylux (see the whole mess with the Tarot cards) fucking disturbs me.

It goes against every thing I learned in the Sherlock, Hobbit and Kingsman fandoms. I’ve never experienced witch hunts or ship bashing so brutal and relentless before and I hope that I will never have to again.

It hurts to see this fandom ruin itself so completely and even though I have met a lot of amazing people through the KBB and the Kylux Christmas Card Exchange I have a bad feeling about this whole thing.

I no longer wish to contribute to the SW fandom, or at the very least contribute to the same extent I have until now.

Maybe I will come back when the next SW movie comes out, maybe I will remain on the sidelines, merely observing. I don’t know. I’m not even angry or mad… Just tired and very sad.

Thank you,

Marlene
